unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes: Your Dream Home Closer Than You Think?**
normalised: home loan schemes your dream home closer than you think

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that flat in Mumbai or a cozy bungalow in Dehradun? Home loan schemes are getting a revamp! Banks like HDFC and SBI are rolling out attractive offers, especially for first-time homebuyers.

unnormalised: Word on the street (read: financial websites!) is that interest rates might fluctuate a bit around Diwali (24/10/2024), so keep an eye out. Some schemes offer lower EMIs for the initial 3 years â€“ perfect for young professionals just starting out!

unnormalised: Plus, there's talk of the government extending the PMAY scheme beyond March 31, 2024, which could mean even more subsidies. Talk to your bank rep, do your homework, and don't be shy to haggle! Remember your CIBIL score is your *kundali* here! Aim for a score of 750 or higher.

unnormalised: Applying online can save you time, but a visit to the branch (say, after your morning chai at 09:30 hrs) can help clear any doubts. Could this be the year you finally own that piece of *zameen*? Just make sure you read all the fine print before signing on the dotted line by 5 PM on 15/07/2024! Good luck!
